plays.text: Goal scored by Michal Handzus assisted by Danny Markov and Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Ray Ferraro 2 minutes for Slashing Ossi Vaananen
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Sean Burke
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Patrik Stefan
Penalty to Todd Simpson 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to LUBOS BARTECKO 2 minutes for High Sticking Danny Markov
Goal scored by Ladislav Nagy assisted by Teppo Numminen and Claude Lemieux
Penalty to JEFF COWAN 2 minutes for Boarding Todd Simpson
Penalty to Todd Simpson 2 minutes for Tripping Tony Hrkac
Penalty to Ray Ferraro 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Ilya Kovalchuk assisted by Patrik Stefan and LUBOS BARTECKO
Penalty to Patrik Stefan 2 minutes for Roughing Daymond Langkow
Penalty to Daymond Langkow 2 minutes for Roughing Patrik Stefan
